mapper.insert: insert into cart(midx, p_idx, cart_cnt) values(#{midx},#{p_idx},#{cart_cnt})
mapper.select: select b.seller_idx, max(a.cart_idx), d.m_nick, a.cart_cnt, b.p_price, sum(cart_cnt*p_price) as seller_price, b.p_dvprice, b.p_free_dvprice, (select sum(b.p_price*a.cart_cnt) from cart a join product b on a.p_idx=b.p_idx where a.midx=#{midx}) as totalProduct from cart a join product b on a.p_idx=b.p_idx join sellerstory c on b.seller_idx=c.seller_idx join members d on c.midx=d.midx where a.midx=#{midx} group by b.seller_idx order by a.cart_idx desc

select a.cart_request, a.cart_idx,a.cart_cnt,a.midx,b.p_idx,b.p_content,b.p_name,b.p_discount,b.p_disprice,b.p_price,c.p_front_img,c.p_ori_filename,c.p_sys_filename, b.seller_idx, a.cart_cnt*b.p_price as c_price,p_free_dvprice,p_dvprice from cart a join product b on a.p_idx = b.p_idx join product_img c on b.p_idx = c.p_idx where midx=#{midx} group by b.p_idx order by a.cart_idx desc

select *,totalproductprice+totaldvprice as totalprice from (select sum(cart_cnt*p_disprice) as totalproductprice, sum( IF((cart_cnt*p_price)>b.p_free_dvprice,0,b.p_dvprice) ) as totaldvprice from cart a join product b on a.p_idx=b.p_idx join sellerstory c on b.seller_idx=c.seller_idx join members d on c.midx=d.midx where a.midx=#{midx}) t
